channel.title: Connecting issue
channel.description: i just downloaded the One-Scape server source and client. and i need to know how to change the ip to mine so i can connect. im offering a small paypal reqard for whoever can help me.. not much, just a few bucks, because i know this is a simple thing, i just dont know whitch file to look in to edit that.. please help.. we can talk over MSN or AIM if you like. thank you

item.title: Connecting issue
item.dc:creator: @helloimwhite helloimwhite
item.description:
@helloimwhite wrote:

^lawl, as i keep saying to people … google is your friend fgs. but seeing as no one else has posted… you need to run the server, port forward, open egui or gui, change those ip’s to 127.0.0.1 (thats your computers local ip address) it will be 100% non accessable from other people

Read full topic
